text: The ravaging chieftain of the Ursfjording tribe is blessed by the Dark Gods.
Unknown to many, yet Beorg Bearstruck shares a blood bond with House Bokha, both descendants of the Great Bear.
Only the very finest beserkers may feast in the Halls of Urslo.
Bran was the legendary chieftain of Urslo and father of Beorg, who struck him down to claim his title.
The Bear Clans of Urslo serve the Dark Gods unconditionally.
He who fights with axe and shield is favoured among the Gods.
The Beserkers of Ursfjord hurl they're axes as if they were mere pebbles.
The Legendary Ursfjord tribe is small in numbers yet great in their victories.
He who chooses the Bear is worshipped by those not blessed with the feats of being Bearstricken.
The Beserkers of Urslo present their Gods offerings to they may bless their fangs, axes and claws.
The very essence of the Great Bear is channeled when the yellow glowing eyes set their sights on any prey.
